Title: Global Freeze Drying Market to Reach USD 15.1 Billion by 2033

Title: Aira secures €150m to expand residential heating electrification in Europe
Summary: Aira has raised €150 million in equity financing from existing investors Altor, Kallskär, Kinnevik, Lingotto and Temasek to accelerate the electrification of residential heating across Europe.
